party_a_name: Electric City Corp., a Delaware corporation
liability_cap: Neither the Distributor nor the Company shall have liability for consequential or liquidated damages pertaining to late delivery unless Company specifically acknowledges and agrees in writing to the same.
risk_explanation: This is a long-term (10-year) exclusive distributor agreement, which can create commercial lock-in and operational risk for a small SaaS vendor. The contract includes non-solicitation/non-compete style restrictions (e.g., not soliciting customers to purchase competitive products for 18 months after term). Liability is not clearly capped overall, though there is a limitation excluding consequential/liquidated damages for late delivery unless agreed in writing.
